text: My ikh sdelali prorokami, prizyvavshimi lyudey k pryamomu puti i k dobrym deyaniyam. I po Nashemu poveleniyu stali oni dlya lyudey rukovoditelyami i poveli ikh za soboy. My vnushili im vershit' dobryye dela, sovershat' molitvu, davat' zakyat (ochistitel'nuyu milostynyu). I tol'ko Nam oni smirenno poklonyalis'
